#### _<div align="left"><sub>// About ðŸŒ¿</sub></div>_

**Zephin** is the React Native mobile application for [Zephyr](https://github.com/parazeeknova/zephyr), the next-generation social media aggregator.  
Designed for seamless mobile use, it brings Zephyrâ€™s aggregation, bookmarking, and sharing features into a native app experience with speed and fluidity.
